title: Who was the better singer: Al Green or Marvin Gaye? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sir, Both artists had the gift of superlative vocal ability but having to choose I’ll go with Marvin. I like more of his music ( my favorite is Hitch Hike )and especially those memorable duets he made with several of Motowns female artists ( especially Tammi Terrell ) like Ain’t Nothing Like The Real Thing "Ain't No Mountain High Enough" Lyric , Ain’t No Mountain High Enough and If I Could Build My Whole World Around You . Then there’s the nice duet It Takes Two performed with the lovely Kim Weston from 67’ A Motown Classic "Marvin Gaye and Kim Weston- It Takes Two". Musical greatness personified !
